::Hunter::

Hunter smiles. Having taken care of the missile, he can now go on to 
this bot that fired at him. He flies down lower.

"Before I kill you, Predacon," he says loud enough for Scorponok to 
hear, "I want you to tell me if Killfest is on this planet, and if he 
is, I want you to tell me how I can get to him."

He aims his weapons at Scorponok, ready to fire.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Robert Dahl <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> Scorponok finally reaches the rock formation and ducks 
behind. "Computer
> damage report" he commands. "energy level 65%.  Begining repair 
systems" it
> hums. "Slag, that robot hit me hard" scroponok peeks out from 
behind the
> rock looking at the new robot. "Who in the slag are you, you damn 
flyer"
